600240.name: FPV Air Tracks - Supporter Pack
600240.description:
"Sticker-Bombed" Quadcopter


Unlock the "Sticker-Bombed" Quadcopter in single and multiplayer.
Based in the most advanced racing qauds of 2017 and featuring a sticker-bombed finish and glowing motor bells!
This quad stands out from the rest and shows everyone your support for FPV Air Tracks!

Supporter Icon & Highlight


Whenever your lap time appears on the screen you will have a special name highlight and fancy supporter icon!

Getting the supporter pack helps Flyleap Studios stay alive and keeps us able to maintain and improve FPV Air Tracks
